name: Kuma-Mon * Bomber: Puzzle de Kuma-Mon Taisou
name_original: Kuma-Mon * Bomber: Puzzle de Kuma-Mon Taisou
description:
Kuma-Mon * Bomber: Puzzle de Kuma-Mon Taisou is a puzzle game developed by Rocket Company. It was originally released in 2014. Rocket Company published the game.
You can play Kuma-Mon * Bomber: Puzzle de Kuma-Mon Taisou on Nintendo 3DS.
